Bristol's Roofing Specialists

1st Choice Roofing is a roofing firm based in Bristol and the South West. We are certified specialists in fibreglass, lead burning, fascias, gutter work, chimneys, flat and tile roofing. We offer:

  • A free, no-obligation quotation
  • A 10 year guarantee on all finished work
  • High quality, long-lasting results
  • Fair, affordable pricing

Roofing

1st Choice has extensive experience in working with all types of roof. Our services include slate, plain tile, felt-batton, and flat roofing.

Guttering

1st Choice is a guttering, fascia and soffit specialist that offers high quality yet affordable results for all customers.

Leadwork

1st Choice is a certified provider of leadwork installations. Our services include lead burning, flat roofing, lead clapping and gutters.
